abstract: The embattled Swiss bank UBS says it will post a third-quarter profit despite a $2.3 billion loss from unauthorized trades discovered last month.
snippet: The embattled Swiss bank UBS says it will post a third-quarter profit despite a $2.3 billion loss from unauthorized trades discovered last month.
lead_paragraph: The embattled Swiss bank UBS said on Tuesday that it would post a third-quarter profit despite a $2.3 billion loss from unauthorized trades discovered last month.

headline.main: UBS Expects 'Modest' Profit Despite Trading Scandal
